title: Can't open LOL, all black
body:
Is there anyone who is in the same situation? So it been a while that I didn't touch lol on my computer and after the big update (the one with the new icon), I can't open it. It never asked me to update it and it is the third time I re-download it... The icon reminds like the old one (square) and when I clicked on it, it appeared and boom all black...Can't even see the "x" to close it... What should I do now? I've been trying several tips that I read but none of it works...

Thank you

replies.body: This black screen you're seeing can be caused by a connection problem that's failing to download assets.  Your best bet would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up, and go from there.  Let me know if you have any questions!
